Trade/Device Name(s): NOVEOS Specific IgE (sIgE), Capture Reagent Cat Dander - E001, Felis domesticus
NOVEOS Specific IgE (sIgE), Capture Reagent Timothy Grass - G006, Phleum pratense
Analyte(s): Allergen-specific IgE (Cat Dander - Felis domesticus, Timothy Grass - Phleum pratense)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NOVEOS Specific IgE capture reagents E001 (Cat Dander) and G006 (Timothy Grass) for quantitative measurement of allergen-specific IgE in human serum using the NOVEOS Immunoassay Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative measurement of allergen-specific IgE in human serum as a diagnostic aid in identifying IgE mediated allergic disorders, for use in clinical laboratories with the NOVEOS Immunoassay Analyzer
